masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "I've been watching you, sweetie. You disappear at odd hours. You're always 'tired.' You have mysterious bruises. And I SAW you on the news last weekâ€”or someone who looked EXACTLY like you. We're going to have a little chat. Just the two of us."
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Deflect Aunt Carol's suspicions without lying outright
  • Come up with a convincing cover story
  • Decide: does she deserve the truth?
